data.lyric:
[ti:It's the Most Wonderful Time of the Year]
[ar:Andy Williams]
[al:The Most Wonderful Time Of The Year]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]It's the Most Wonderful Time of the Year - Andy Williams (安迪·威廉姆斯)
[00:03.84]Written by：George Wyle/Edward Pola/Johnny Mandel
[00:07.69]It's the most wonderful time of the year
[00:12.36]
[00:14.57]With the kids jingle belling
[00:16.79]And everyone telling you be of good cheer
[00:20.30]
[00:21.51]It's the most wonderful time of the year
[00:26.63]
[00:28.96]It's the hap happiest season of all
[00:33.50]
[00:35.98]With those holiday greetings and gay happy meetings
[00:39.78]When friends come to call
[00:41.53]
[00:43.08]It's the hap happiest season of all
[00:47.87]
[00:50.35]There'll be parties for hosting
[00:52.27]Marshmallows for toasting
[00:54.08]And caroling out in the snow
[00:56.52]
[00:57.27]There'll be scary ghost stories
[00:59.37]And tales of the glories of
[01:01.27]Christmases long long ago
[01:03.36]
[01:06.05]It's the most wonderful time of the year
[01:10.74]
[01:13.23]There'll be much mistltoeing
[01:15.39]And hearts will be glowing
[01:17.18]When love ones are near
[01:18.74]
[01:20.34]It's the most wonderful time of the year
[01:24.90]
[01:34.69]There'll be parties for hosting
[01:36.91]Marshmallows for toasting
[01:38.71]And caroling out in the snow
[01:41.87]There'll be scary ghost stories
[01:44.06]And tales of the glories of
[01:46.04]Christmases long long ago
[01:48.12]
[01:54.37]It's the most wonderful time of the year
[01:59.07]
[02:01.83]There'll be much mistltoeing
[02:04.10]And hearts will be glowing
[02:05.83]When love ones are near
[02:07.28]
[02:08.64]It's the most wonderful time
[02:12.15]It's the most wonderful time
[02:15.24]
[02:15.91]It's the most wonderful time of the year
